description: Non-material minor amendment of planning permission ref P091052 dated 2 June 2010 for the Change of use of existing building from D1 (non residential institutions) to 30 residential units. Removal of existing rear extension and erection of new rear extension. Addition of roof extension to create an additional floor. External alterations to windows and introduction of new entrance.  Installation of solar panels to roof. The non-material minor amendment is: The use of acoustic air bricks on the Duncan Street and Duncan Terrace elevations.
decision_conditions: The amendment sought (as stated on the application form) is for the addition of acoustic air bricks only. The drawings submited in support of this indicate that some of the windows are different to those shown on the approved drawings for planning permission P091052. This decision does not approve the indicated changes to the windows.
